title: Understanding Bitcoin Derivatives with CL207
description: Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente and Derivatives trader CL207 talk about perpetual swaps, open interest, funding, quarterlies, and more for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!  CL's Twitter: twitter.com/CL207
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
